explains: n. 奴役，束缚；施虐性行为

sentences.en: All people, she said, lived their lives in bondage to hunger, pain and lust.
sentences.cn: 她说所有人都生活在饥饿、痛苦和欲望的束缚之中。

sentences.en: In Turnerian terminology, the frontier had furnished "a gate of escape from the bondage of the past."
sentences.cn: 用 Turnerian 的话来说，边境提供了“逃离过去束缚的大门”。

sentences.en: The remaining partners in the law firm were still together, attached unwillingly at the hip by the bondage of mortgages and the banknotes.
sentences.cn: 律师事务所的其余合伙人仍然在一起，被抵押贷款和钞票的束缚不情愿地绑在一起。
